title: New: Bruno Major – Second Time
content:
Bruno Major’s new track Second Time is a gorgeous ballad that needs to be heard.

 Originally written by fellow songwriter Jonny Latimer, Bruno released it after getting Jonny’s blessing and has done it all the justice it deserves. A beautiful and simple story of infatuation, the lyrics set the scene supported by a sweet melody. The song feels almost like a lullaby with Bruno’s gentle vocals and fingered picked acoustic, however the addition of tight drums and a woozy guitar solo towards the end of the track keep it from being too sleepy.
